
Testing footnote and citation

numbered footnote
=================

[1]


auto-numbered footnote
======================

[2]


named footnote
==============

[3]


citation
========

[bar]


footnotes in table
==================


Table caption [4]
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+----------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+
| name [5]                                           | desription                                         |
+====================================================+====================================================+
| VIDIOC_CROPCAP                                     | Information about VIDIOC_CROPCAP                   |
+----------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+


footenotes
==========

-[ Footnotes ]-

[1] numbered

[2] auto numbered

[3] named

-[ Citations ]-

[bar] cite

[4] footnotes in table caption

[5] footnotes in table


missing target
==============

[missing] citation
